name: MSc Actuarial and Risk Analytics
title: MSc Actuarial and Risk Analytics
description:
Develop your actuarial and risk analytics expertise through the MSc Actuarial and Risk Analytics (MARA) programme in Singapore — one of the world’s leading financial hubs and a centre for innovation in finance, insurance, and sustainability. The MARA programme offers an ideal platform to build your expertise at the heart of a dynamic, globally connected economy.
Designed for students with strong analytical and numerical abilities and a passion for insurance, finance, and risk management, MARA integrates actuarial science, risk management, and climate and sustainability studies into a forward-thinking, interdisciplinary curriculum. You will gain the skills and insights needed to navigate an increasingly complex and evolving global landscape, empowering you to manage risks, address emerging challenges, and drive meaningful impact across industries.
The programme can be completed in one year on a full-time basis. Our graduates are highly sought after, often beginning their careers as actuaries or actuarial analysts before progressing into managerial and leadership roles. MARA also lays a strong foundation for those seeking to pursue further professional actuarial credentials.
Measuring and managing climate risks is becoming increasingly vital for institutions across the financial system, particularly in the insurance sector. However, there remains a significant shortage of professionals with both actuarial and risk analytics expertise, coupled with a deep understanding of climate-related risks.
The MARA programme is designed to address this critical talent gap. By equipping students with a rare and highly sought-after combination of skills, MARA prepares graduates to meet the rising demand for talent across Southeast Asia and beyond. This distinctive interdisciplinary approach empowers students to lead in risk-related industries and contribute meaningfully as the global economy transitions towards a greener, more sustainable future.
Innovative Interdisciplinary Curricu

sections.Innovative Interdisciplinary Curriculum: Gain in-demand expertise through a cutting-edge curriculum that blends actuarial science, risk management, and climate and sustainability studies. This integrated approach prepares you to tackle today’s financial and environmental challenges and opens pathways to diverse career opportunities across industries.
sections.Industry-Driven Learning & Networks: Gain insights from certified actuaries and risk experts, and benefit from real-world case studies and industry engagement. Based in Singapore, a leading financial and innovation hub, you will be positioned to tap into diverse career opportunities and global networks, accelerating your impact from day one.
sections.Pathway to Global Professional Accredita: Offered by Singapore’s only business school with accredited actuarial science undergraduate programme, MARA sets you on a recognised pathway toward professional accreditation through the Institute and Faculty of Actuaries (IFoA) and the Society of Actuaries (SOA). The programme also serves as a springboard for global careers in risk, finance, and related fields. Whether you are pursuing credentials from the Global Association of Risk Professionals (GARP) or charting your own course, MARA equips you with the analytical rigour and industry-relevant skills to thrive.
sections.南洋-交大EMBA | 三月说明会: 08 Mar 2026 02.30 PM - 03.15 PM 上海交通大学徐汇校区安泰楼A305 / 腾讯会议 Add to Calendar
